name: Pact Vampire
description: The Pact Vampire is a Medium Undead creature known for its cunning and magical abilities, possessing a powerful physique with a Strength score of 22 and a Charisma of 20. Its unique features include poisonous blood and the ability to regenerate unless affected by radiant damage.
memorable: It can summon fiends to aid it in battle, and its ability to draw blood inflicts necrotic damage and heals itself.
goals: To dominate and manipulate its foes, exploiting its vampiric powers.
relations: May be encountered alongside fiends and often has connections to dark powers or cults.
environment: Typically found in dark, cursed locations or ruins associated with evil and magic.
strengths: Has high saving throws and immunity to poison damage, making it difficult to defeat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to sunlight and radiant damage, which can bypass its regeneration.
attacks: Utilizes multiple claw attacks that deal slashing and poison damage, alongside necrotic damage through its blood-drawing ability.
most_powerful_ability: The Call Blood action allows it to draw significant health from its enemies while enhancing its own vitality.
senses: Possesses darkvision extending 120 feet and a passive Perception of 17.
skills: Proficient in Persuasion, Stealth, and has strong Perception skills.
additional_information: Can magically charm humanoids to obey its commands for a day.
Regenerates 25 hit points at the start of its turn unless exposed to radiant damage.
Blood Sense enables it to locate creatures within 60 feet.
Legendary Resistance allows it to avoid failed saving throws.
test_queries: creature weak to sunlight and radiant damage
